item.text: @#/ /shes bar kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi sa ma ya a laM kA ra nA ma pradz+nyA pA ra mi to pa de sha shAs+t+ra kA ri kA/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos
mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis
nyer zhir 'khrid mdzad gang yin dang / /'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang / /gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan
sna tshogs 'di gsungs pa/ /nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum de la phyag 'tshal/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam/ /ston pas 'di rnams
bshad pa gang / /gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin te/ /chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi/ /mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas/ /blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur phyir/ /bde blag tu ni rtogs pa
zhes/ /bya ba rtsam pa'i dgos pa yin/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni/ /dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad/ /rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid/ /de nas thams cad shes pa nyid/ /rnam kun mngon

rdzogs rtogs pa dang / /rtse mor phyin dang mthar gyis pa/ /skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub/ /chos kyi sku dang de rnam brgyad/ /sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang / /nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang / /sgrub pa yi

ni rten gyur pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / /dmigs pa dag dang ched dang ni/ /go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang / /tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams/ /thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid/ /mog mog por byed la sogs

dang / /slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang / /'di dang gzhan pa'i yon tan gyis/ /phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam/ /byed pa dang ni mos pa dang / /bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang / /bsngo dang rjes su yi rang ba/ /yid la byed

pa bla med dag /sgrub dang shin tu dag pa zhes/ /bya ba 'di ni sgom pa'i lam/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyi/ /lam shes nyid ni de 'drar bshad/ /shes pas srid la mi gnas shing / /snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang / /

thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang / /thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid/ /mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag dang / /sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang / /nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i lam/ /de 'dra kun shes nyid du 'dod/ /rnam pa sbyor bar bcas rnams dang / /yon tan skyon

ni mtshan nyid bcas/ /thar dang nges 'byed cha mthun dang / /slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs/ /srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid dang / /zhing dag bla na med pa ni/ /rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa ste/ /'di ni thabs mkhas bcas pa yin/ /de yi rtags dang rnam 'phel dang / /

brtan dang sems kun gnas pa dang / /mthong zhes bya dang sgom pa zhes/ /bya ba'i lam ni so so la/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi/ /gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni/ /bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /log par sgrub dang bcas pa ni/ /rtse mo'i mngon rtogs mthar gyis

pa/ /rnam gsum rnam bcu skad cig ma/ /gcig gis mngon rdzogs byang chub pa/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi/ /ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang / /de bzhin gzhan pa sprul pa ni/ /chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa/ /rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod/ /

sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/ /de dang de ni mdo bzhin du/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa'i sgo nas brjod/ /de yang sa gser zla ba me/ /gter dang rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho/ /rdo rje ri sman bshes gnyen dang / /yid

bzhin nor bu nyi ma glu/ /rgyal po mdzod dang lam po che/ /bzhon pa bkod ma'i chu dang ni/ /sgra brnyan chu bo sprin rnams kyis/ /rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/ /sgrub dang bden pa rnams dang ni/ /sangs rgyas la sogs dkon mchog gsum/ /ma zhen yongs su mi ngal dang / /

lam ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang / /spyan lnga dang ni mngon shes kyi/ /yon tan drug dang mthong lam dang / /bsgom zhes bya la gdams ngag ni/ /bcu yi bdag nyid shes par bya/ /dbang po rtul dang rnon po dang / /dad dang mthong thob rigs nas rigs/ /bar chad gcig par

skyes nas dang / /byed dang byed min 'og min 'gro/ /'phar gsum srid rtse'i mthar thug 'gro/ /gzugs kyi chags bcom mthong ba yi/ /chos la zhi lus mngon sum byed/ /bse ru dang ni nyi shu'o/ /dmigs pa dang ni rnam pa dang / /sgyu dang yongs su

'dzin pa yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi/ /drod sogs bdag nyid ji bzhin du/ /rnam rtog bzhi po ldan brten pa/ /chung dang 'bring dang chen po rnams/ /nyan thos bse ru lta bu dang / /bcas pa dag las khyad par 'phags/ /dmigs pa mi rtag la sogs pa/ /

bden pa'i rten can de yi ni/ /rnam pa mngon zhen la sogs 'gog /theg pa gsum char 'thob pa'i rgyu/ /gzugs sogs 'du 'god gnas bral dang / /gnas dang brtags dang brjod du med/ /gzugs sogs mi gnas de dag ni/ /de yi ngo bo rang bzhin med/ /de dag

gcig gi rang bzhin gcig /de mi rtag sogs par mi gnas/ /de rnams de yi ngo bos stong / /de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig /chos rnams mi 'dzin gang yin dang / /de dag mtshan mar mi mthong phyir/ /shes rab kyis ni yongs rtogs pa/ /thams cad dmigs su

med par ro/ /gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid med nyid/ /de med pa nyid ngo bo nyid/ /de dag skye med nges 'byung med/ /dag dang de dag mtshan ma med/ /de yi mtshan mar mi brten pas/ /mos min 'du shes med pa yin/ /ting 'dzin de yi byed pa nyid/ /lung ston pa dang

rlom pa zad/ /gsum po phan tshun ngo bo gcig /ting 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa/ /de ltar nges 'byed cha mthun ni/ /chung dang 'bring dang chen po yin/ /gzhi dang de yi gnyen po yis/ /gzung bar rtog pa rnam pa gnyis/ /rmongs dang phung sogs bye brag gis/ /de ni

so sor rnam pa dgu/ /rdzas dang brtags pa'i rten can gyis/ /'dzin pa'ang rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /rang dbang bdag sogs ngo bo dang / /phung sogs rten las de bzhin no/ /sems mi 'gong ba nyid la sogs/ /ngo bo nyid med sogs ston byed/ /de yi mi mthun

phyogs bor ba/ /rnam pa kun tu yongs 'dzin yin/ /rtogs pa yi ni chos drug dang / /gnyen po dang ni spong ba dang / /de dag yongs su gtugs pa dang / /shes rab snying brtser bcas pa dang / /slob ma thun mong min nyid dang / /gzhan gyi don gyi go rims dang / /

ye shes rtsol ba mi mnga' bar/ /'jug pa'i rten la rigs shes bya/ /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir/ /rigs ni tha dad rung ma yin/ /rten pa'i chos kyi bye brag gis/ /de yi dbye ba yongs su brjod/ /dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad de/ /de yang dge la

sogs pa yin/ /'jig rten pa yi rtogs pa dang / /gang dag 'jig rten 'das 'dod dang / /zag bcas zag pa med chos dang / /gang dag 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/ /slob mthun mong chos rnams dang / /gang dag thub pa'i thun mong min/ /sems can kun

mchog nyid sems dang / /spangs dang rtogs dang gsum po la/ /chen po gsum gyi rang byung gi /ched du bya ba 'di shes bya/ /de dag so sor sbyin la sogs/ /rnam pa drug tu bsdus pa yis/ /go cha'i sgrub pa gang yin de/ /drug tshan drug gis ji bzhin

bshad/ /bsam gtan gzugs med sbyin sogs dang / /lam dang byams la sogs pa dang / /dmigs pa med dang ldan pa dang / /'khor gsum rnam par dag pa dang / /ched du bya dang mngon shes drug /rnam kun mkhyen pa'i tshul la ni/ /'jug pa'i sgrub

pa theg chen la/ /'dzegs pa yin par shes par bya/ /brtse dang sbyin la sogs pa drug /zhi gnas lhag mthong bcas pa dang / /zung du 'brel ba'i lam gang dang / /thabs la mkhas pa gang yin dang / /ye shes dang ni bsod nams dang / /lam dang gzungs

dang sa bcu dang / /gnyen po tshogs kyi sgrub pa yi/ /rim pa yin par shes par bya/ /yongs su sbyong ba rnam bcu yis/ /sa ni dang po 'thob 'gyur te/ /bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang / /sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid/ /gtong dang bshes gnyen

bsten pa dang / /dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang / /rtag tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang / /sangs rgyas skur 'dod dga' ba dang / /chos ston pa dang bden pa yi/ /tshig ni bcu pa yin par 'dod/ /'di dag rang bzhin mi dmigs pas/ /yongs su sbyong

bar shes par bya/ /tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod/ /rab tu dga' dang snying brtse che/ /bkur sti bla ma la gus nyan/ /brgyad pa sbyin la sogs la brtson/ /thos pas mi ngoms nyid dang ni/ /zang zing med par chos sbyin dang / /sangs rgyas zhing kun sbyong ba dang / /

'khor bas yongs su mi skyo dang / /ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba/ /rlom med bdag nyid de rnam lnga/ /nags gnas 'dod chung chog shes dang / /sbyangs pa yang dag sdom bsten dang / /bslab pa yongs su mi gtong dang / /'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang / /mya ngan 'das

dang bdog kun gtong / /mi zhum pa dang lta ba med/ /'dris dang khyim la 'khren pa dang / /'du 'dzir gyur pa'i gnas dang ni/ /bdag bstod gzhan la brnyas pa dang / /mi dge'i las kyi lam bcu dang / /rlom pas khengs dang phyin ci log /blo ngan dang ni nyon mongs

bzod/ /bcu po 'di ni rnam spangs na/ /sa lnga pa ni yang dag 'thob/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab rab rdzogs pas/ /slob ma dang ni bse ru la/ /dga' dang skrag pa'i sems spangs pa/ /bslangs na mi zhum bdog pa kun/ /

btang yang mi dga' med pa dang / /dbul yang slong ba mi spong bas/ /sa ni drug pa yang dag 'thob/ /bdag dang sems can 'dzin pa dang / /srog dang gang zag chad rtag dang / /mtshan ma rgyu dang phung po dang / /khams dang skye mched dag dang ni/ /khams gsum po la

gnas dang chags/ /sems ni kun tu zhum pa dang / /dkon mchog gsum dang tshul khrims la/ /der lta ba yi mngon zhen dang / /stong pa nyid la rtsod pa dang / /de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa ni/ /nyi shu gang la rnam chad pa/ /de yis sa ni bdun pa 'thob/ /rnam thar sgo

gsum shes pa dang / /'khor gsum rnam par dag nyid dang / /snying rje dang ni rlom med dang / /chos mnyam nyid dang tshul gcig shes/ /mi skye ba dang bzod shes dang / /chos rnams rnam pa gcig tu ston/ /rtog pa kun tu 'joms pa dang / /'du shes lta dang nyon mongs

spong / /zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang / /lhag mthong la ni mkhas pa dang / /sems dul ba dang thams cad la/ /thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang / /chags pa'i sa min gar 'dod par/ /zhing gzhan du ni mnyam 'gro dang / /kun tu bdag gi ngo bo ni/ /ston pa nyid

dang nyi shu'o/ /sems can kun yid shes pa dang / /mngon par shes pas brtse ba dang / /sangs rgyas zhing bzang sgrub pa dang / /yongs su brtag phyir sangs rgyas brten/ /dbang po shes dang rgyal ba yi/ /zhing sbyong sgyu ma ltar gnas dang / /bsams bzhin srid pa

len pa dang / /las ni rnam pa 'di brgyad bshad/ /smon lam dag ni mtha' yas dang / /lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang / /spobs pa chu bo lta bu dang / /mngal du 'jug pa mchog dang ni/ /rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang / /'khor dang skye ba dag dang ni/ /nges

'byung byang chub shing rnams dang / /yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ /sa dgu 'das nas ye shes ni/ /gang gis sangs rgyas sar gnas pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa/ /bcu pa yin par shes par bya/ /mthong dang sgom pa'i lam dag la/ /gzung

dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnams/ /nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gnyen po rnam pa brgyad ces bya/ /ched du bya dang mnyam nyid dang / /sems can don dang 'bad med dang / /mtha' las 'das par nges 'byung dang / /thob pa'i mtshan nyid nges 'byung dang / /rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen nyid dang / /lam gyi yul can nges 'byung ste/ /rnam pa brgyad kyi bdag nyid 'di/ /nges 'byung sgrub pa yin zhes bya/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/ skabs dang

po'o// //lha rnams rung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'od kyis mog mog por mdzad dang / /yul nges pa dang khyab pa dang / /rang bzhin dang ni de yi las/ /lam shes nyid kyi tshul la ni/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag gi/ /rnam pa mi

dmigs sgo nas ni/ /nyan thos lam 'di shes par bya/ /'phags pa nyan thos lam la ni/ /gzugs la sogs pa stong pa'i phyir/ /stong pa nyid rnams dbyer med pas/ /dro ba de dag mi dmigs pas/ /rtse mor gyur pa dag tu 'dod/ /de la rtag la sogs tshul

gyis/ /gnas pa bkag pas bzod pa rnams/ /sa bcu dag las brtsams nas ni/ /mi gnas rgyas par bstan pa yis/ /chos kyi mchog tu 'gyur bshad de/ /ci phyir zhe na sangs rgyas kyis/ /mkhyen nas chos rnams ma gzigs phyir/ /rang byung bdag nyid rtogs

pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyis bstan yang mi dgos la/ /bse ru lta bu'i ye shes ni/ /zab pa nyid du mngon par brjod/ /gang gang don ni gang gang la/ /ji lta ji ltar nyan 'dod pa/ /de de la don de dang de/ /sgra med kyang de de ltar snang / /gzung don rtog pa spong phyir dang / /

'dzin pa mi spong phyir dang ni/ /rten gyis bse ru lta bu'i lam/ /yang dag bsdus par shes par bya/ /btags pa'i chos nyid mi 'gal bar/ /ston pa'i rnam pa dror gyur pa/ /rtse mor gyur pa gzugs la sogs/ /'grib pa med la sogs pas phye/ /nang stong nyid

la sogs pa yis/ /gzugs sogs mi 'dzin phyir bzod pa/ /gzugs sogs skye ba med sogs kyi/ /rnam pa can ni chos kyi mchog /bden dang bden la bzod pa dang / /shes pa'i skad cig rnam bzhi yis/ /lam shes nyid la mthong ba'i lam/ /phan yon bcas

pa 'di bshad do/ /de bzhin nyid dang sangs rgyas dag /phan tshun rten pa rten med phyir/ /rnam grangs khas mi len pa dang / /chen po tshad ma med bcas dang / /tshad med pa dang mtha' med dang / /der gnas gzugs la sogs pa la/ /sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'dzin dang / /

blang med dor ba med sogs dang / /byams la sogs pa stong nyid dang / /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'thob pa dang / /rnam par byang kun yongs bsdus dang / /nyam nga ba dang nad kun sel/ /mya ngan 'das 'dzin zhi nyid dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsrung la sogs/ /srog mi

gcod pa la sogs pa/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen tshul la ni/ /bdag nyid gnas te sems can dag /'god dang sbyin pa la sogs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba/ /lam shes nyid kyi skad cig ma/ /kun nas zhi dang thams cad la/ /bdud dang nyon mongs las rgyal

dang / /gnod pas brdzi ba med nyid dang / /byang chub dang ni rten mchod nyid/ /mos pa rang gi don dang ni/ /rang gzhan don dang gzhan don dang / /rnam gsum shes bya de yang ni/ /chung dang 'bring dang chen po ste/ /so sor rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yis/ /de

yang rnam gsum de ltar na/ /rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa la/ /mos pa'i gnas skabs rnams la ni/ /dgu tshan gsum gyis bstod pa dang / /bkur ba dang ni bsngags par 'dod/ /yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can/ /de yi byed pa mchog

yin no/ /de ni dmigs med rnam pa can/ /phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid do/ /dben dang sangs rgyas bsod nams tshogs/ /rang bzhin dran pa'i spyod yul can/ /thabs bcas mtshan ma med pa dang / /sangs rgyas rjes su yi rang dang / /khams gsum rtogs pa ma yin

dang / /chung dang 'bring dang chen po yi/ /bsngo ba gzhan ni rnam gsum po/ /bsod nams che 'byung bdag nyid do/ /thabs dang mi dmigs pa dag gis/ /dge ba'i rtsa la yi rang ba/ /rjes su yi rang yid byed pa/ /bsgom pa yin par 'dir brjod do/ /de yi ngo bo nyid

mchog nyid/ /kun la mngon par 'du mi byed/ /chos rnams dmigs su med par ni/ /gtod par byed pa don chen nyid/ /sangs rgyas bsten dang sbyin sogs dang / /thabs la mkhas pa gang yin pa/ /'di la mos pa'i rgyu dag yin/ /chos kyis phongs pa'i rgyu

dag ni/ /bdud kyi thibs kyis non pa dang / /zab mo'i chos la ma mos dang / /phung po la sogs mngon zhen dang / /sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs zin pa'o/ /'bras bu dag pa gzugs la sogs/ /dag pa nyid de gang gi phyir/ /de gnyis tha

dad ma yin zhing / /bcad du med pas dag par brjod/ /nyon mongs shes bya lam gsum gyi/ /nyams phyir slob ma bse ru dang / /rgyal sras rnams kyi dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnam kun shin tu ba/ /sa dgu la ni chen po yi/ /chen po la sogs dri ma yi/ /gnyen po

chung ngu'i chung ngu la/ /sogs pa'i lam ni dag pa yin/ /de la klan ka spangs pa yis/ /lam ni 'jal dang gzhal bya dag /mnyam pa nyid kyis khams gsum gyi/ /gnyen po nyid du 'dod pa yin/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par

rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/ skabs gnyis pa'o// //tshu rol pha rol mtha' la min/ /de dag bar na mi gnas pa/ /dus rnams mnyam pa nyid shes phyir/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod/ /de ni mtshan mar dmigs sgo nas/ /thabs

ma yin pas ring ba ste/ /de ni thabs la mkhas pa yis/ /yang dag nye ba nyid du bshad/ /gzugs sogs phung po stong nyid dang / /dus gsum rtogs pa'i chos rnams dang / /sbyin sogs byang chub phyogs rnams la/ /spyod pa'i 'du shes mi mthun phyogs/ /sbyin la

sogs la ngar 'dzin med/ /gzhan dag de la 'dzud byed pa/ /de ni chags pa'i mtha' 'gog pas/ /rgyal la sogs la chags pa phra/ /chos kyi lam ni rang bzhin gyis/ /dben pa'i phyir na de zab nyid/ /chos rnams rang bzhin gcig par ni/ /shes pas chags pa spong ba yin/ /

mthong ba la sogs bkag pa yis/ /de ni rtogs par dka' bar bshad/ /gzugs la sogs par mi shes phyir/ /de ni bsam mi khyab par 'dod/ /de ltar kun shes nyid lugs la/ /mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag gi /rnam par dbye ba ma lus pa/ /ji skad bshad pa 'dir

shes bya/ /gzugs sogs de mi rtag sogs dang / /de ma rdzogs dang rab rdzogs dang / /de la chags pa med nyid la/ /spyod pa bkag pa'i sbyor ba dang / /mi 'gyur byed po med nyid dang / /bya dka' rnam gsum sbyor ba dang / /skal ba ji bzhin 'bras thob pas/ /'bras yod

'dod pa de dang ni/ /gzhan la rag las med gang dang / /snang ba rnam bdun shes byed do/ /gzugs la sogs la rlom med pa/ /rnam bzhi de yi mnyam pa nyid/ /sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa la/ /chos shes rjes su shes pa dang / /bzod shes skad cig bdag nyid 'di/ /

kun shes tshul la mthong ba'i lam/ /gzugs rtag ma yin mi rtag min/ /mtha' las 'das dang rnam dag dang / /ma skyes ma 'gags la sogs dang / /mkha' 'dra chags pa spangs pa dang / /yongs su 'dzin las grol ba dang / /ngo bo nyid kyis brjod med dang / /

gang phyir 'di don brjod pa yis/ /gzhan la sbyin du med pa dang / /dmigs pa med par byed pa dang / /shin tu rnam dag nad mi 'byung / /ngan song chad dang 'bras bu ni/ /mngon du bya la mi rtog nyid/ /mtshan ma dag dang ma 'brel dang / /dngos dang ming dang gnyis po

la/ /shes pa skye ba med pa ni/ /kun shes nyid kyi skad cig ma/ /de ltar 'di dang yang 'di dang / /yang 'di yin te rnam gsum po/ /'di ni gnas skabs gsum po dag /rdzogs par yongs su bstan pa yin/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan

bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/ skabs gsum pa'o// //gzhi shes pa yi bye brag rnams/ /rnam pa zhes bya mtshan nyid de/ /kun mkhyen nyid ni rnam gsum phyir/ /de ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /med pa'i rnam pa

nas bzung ste/ /mi g.yo ba yi rnam pa'i bar/ /bden pa so so la bzhi dang / /lam la de ni bco lngar bshad/ /rgyu dang lam dang sdug bsngal dang / /'gog pa la ni go rims bzhin/ /de dag brgyad dang bdun dang ni/ /lnga dang bcu drug ces bsgrags so/ /

dran pa nyer gzhag nas bzung ste/ /sangs rgyas rnam pa'i mthar thug rnams/ /lam gyi bden pa'i rjes mthun par/ /kun mkhyen gsum du phye bas na/ /slob ma byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sangs rgyas rnams la rim bzhin du/ /sum cu

bdun dang sum cu bzhi/ /sum cu rtsa dgu dag tu bzhed/ /sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par byas/ /de la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun/ /dge ba'i bshes kyi mgon bcas pa/ /'di mnyan pa yi snod yin no/ /sangs rgyas bstan dang kun 'dri dang / /sbyin dang tshul

khrims sogs spyod pas/ /len dang 'dzin la sogs pa yi/ /snod du dam pa rnams bzhed do/ /gzugs la sogs la mi gnas phyir/ /de la sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir/ /de yi de bzhin nyid zab phyir/ /de rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ /de dag tshad ni

med phyir dang / /tshegs chen yun ring rtogs pa'i phyir/ /lung bstan phyir mi ldog nyid dang / /nges 'byung bar chad med bcas dang / /byang chub nye dang myur ba dang / /gzhan don 'phel med 'grib med phyir/ /chos dang chos min sogs mi mthong / /gzugs

sogs bsam mi khyab mi mthong / /gzugs sogs de yi mtshan ma dang / /de yi ngo bor rnam mi rtog /'bras bu rin chen sbyin byed dang / /de ni dag pa mtshams dang bcas/ /bdud kyi mthu bcom la sogs pa/ /yon tan rnam pa bcu bzhi'o/ /skyon ni bcu

tshan bzhir bcas pa/ /drug tu nges par rtogs par bya/ /gang gi mtshon te mtshan nyid du/ /shes bya de yang rnam pa gsum/ /shes pa khyad par byed pa ste/ /ngo bo nyid gang mtshon bya yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / /'jig rten 'jig med bdag

nyid dang / /sems can sems kyi spyod pa dang / /de bsdus pa dang phyir ltas dang / /mi bzad pa yi rnam pa dang / /chags bcas sogs dang rgya chen dang / /chen por gyur dang tshad med dang / /rnam shes bstan du med pa dang / /sems bltar med dang shes pa de/ /

g.yo ba la sogs shes bya dang / /de las gzhan yang de dag ni/ /de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par shes/ /thub pas de bzhin nyid rtogs te/ /gzhan la bstan pa zhes bya 'di/ /thams cad shes pa nyid skabs kyi/ /shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa yin/ /stong nyid mtshan med

bcas pa dang / /smon pa rnam par spangs pa dang / /skye med 'gag pa med sogs dang / /chos nyid rnam par 'khrug med dang / /'du mi byed dang rnam mi rtog /rab dbye mtshan nyid med nyid la/ /lam shes nyid kyi skabs kyis ni/ /shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin par bzhed/ /

de ni nyid kyi chos bsten nas/ /gnas dang gus par bya ba dang / /bla ma nyid dang mnyes pa dang / /de la mchod dang byed med dang / /kun tu 'jug mkhyen gang yin dang / /ma mthong ston par mdzad pa dang / /'jig rten stong nyid rnam pa dang / /brjod dang shes mdzad mngon sum

mdzad/ /bsam mi khyab dang zhi nyid ston/ /'jig rten 'du shes 'gog pa la/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen tshul la ni/ /shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do/ /bsam mi khyab sogs khyad par gyis/ /khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod yul can/ /skad cig ma ni bcu drug

gis/ /khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin/ /bsam mi khyab dang mi mnyam dang / /gzhal dang bgrang las yang dag 'das/ /'phags pa kun bsdus mkhas pa yis/ /rig bya thun mong min shes nyid/ /shes myur bri dang gang med dang / /sgrub dang yang dag

'grub pa dang / /dmigs pa brtan dang bcas pa dang / /mtha' dag pa dang yongs 'dzin dang / /ro myang med dang khyad par ni/ /bcu drug bdag nyid ces bya ste/ /gang gis lam ni gzhan dag las/ /khyad du 'phags pas khyad par lam/ /phan dang bde dang skyob pa

dang / /mi rnams kyi ni skyabs dag dang / /gnas dang dpung gnyen gling dang ni/ /yongs 'dren pa zhes bya ba dang / /lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyis/ /'bras bu mngon sum mi byed dag /tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste/ /'di ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /nyon

mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang / /mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dag /dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang / /ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang / /mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang / /dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang / /mi mthun thogs pa med dang de/ /

gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang / /de bzhin nyid ni mi dmigs dang / /ngo bo nyid bcu drug bdag nyid/ /mtshon bya lta bur mtshon pas na/ /mtshan nyid bzhi par bzhed pa yin/ /mtshan med rab tu sbyin la sogs/ /yang dag sgrub la mkhas pa ni/ /rnam pa thams cad

rtogs 'di la/ /thar pa'i cha dang mthun par 'dod/ /sangs rgyas sogs dmigs dad pa dang / /sbyin sogs spyod yul brtson 'grus dang / /bsam pa phun tshogs dran pa dang / /rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin dang / /chos rnams rnam pa thams cad du/ /shes pa'i shes

rab dang rnam lnga/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnon po yis/ /rtogs sla rtul pos rtogs dkar bzhed/ /dro ba rnams kyi dmigs pa 'dir/ /sems can thams cad yin par bsngags/ /de dag nyid la sems mnyam sogs/ /rnam pa dag ni bcur bshad do/ /bdag nyid sdig

pa las ldog cing / /sbyin la sogs la gnas pas gzhan/ /de dag la ni 'god pa dang / /bsngags pa brjod dang mthun pa nyid/ /rtser gyur de bzhin bzod pa ni/ /rang gzhan rten can bden shes pa/ /chos mchog de bzhin sems can rnams/ /smin byed sogs

kyis shes par bya/ /nges 'byed yan lag nas bzung ste/ /mthong dang sgom pa'i lam dag la/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas/ /de 'dir mi ldog pa yi tshogs/ /gzugs la sogs las ldog sogs rtags/ /rnam pa nyi shur brjod pa yis/ /nges

'byed yan lag la gnas pa'i/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid 'di/ /gzugs la sogs las ldog pa dang / /the tshom mi ngal zad pa dang / /bdag nyid dge ba la gnas shing / /gzhan dag de la 'god pa dang / /gzhan gyi rten can sbyin sogs dang / /zab mo'i

don la'ang som nyi med/ /byams lus sogs dang sgrib pa ni/ /rnam pa lnga dang mi 'grogs dang / /bag la nyal kun 'joms pa dang / /dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dang / /gos la sogs pa gtsang ba dang / /lus la srin bu rnams mi 'byung / /gya gyu med

sems sbyangs pa ni/ /len dang ser sna med sogs dang / /chos nyid ldan par 'gro nyid dang / /sems can don du dmyal tshol dang / /gzhan gyis bkri bar mi btub dang / /lam gzhan nye bar ston bdud la/ /bdud ces bya bar rtogs pa dang / /sangs rgyas

dgyes pa'i spyod pa ste/ /rtags ni nyi shu de dag gis/ /drod dang rtse mo bzod bcas dang / /chos mchog rnams la gnas pa ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog /mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang / /shes pa'i skad cig bcu drug ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi

ldog pa'i/ /mtshan nyid yin par shes par bya/ /gzugs sogs 'du shes ldog pa dang / /sems brten theg pa dman dag las/ /rnam log bsam gtan la sogs pa'i/ /yan lag yongs su zad pa dang / /lus sems yang ba nyid dang ni/ /'dod la spyod la

thabs mkhas dang / /rtag tu tshangs par spyod nyid dang / /'tsho ba rnam par dag nyid dang / /phung sogs bar chad byed rnams dang / /tshogs dang dbang sogs bcas pa yi/ /g.yul 'gyed ser sna la sogs la/ /sbyor dang rjes su sbyor ba yi/ /gnas pa so sor

bkag pa dang / /chos ni rdul tsam mi dmigs nyid/ /rang gi sa la nges pa nyid/ /sa gsum la ni gnas pa dang / /chos kyi don du srog gtong ba/ /de 'dra'i skad cig bcu drug ni/ /blo ldan mthong ba'i lam gnas pa'i/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dag yin/ /

sgom pa'i lam ni zab pa ste/ /zab mo stong pa nyid la sogs/ /zab pa de ni sgro 'dogs dang / /skur pa'i mtha' las grol ba nyid/ /nges 'byed yan lag dang mthong ba'i/ /lam dang sgom pa'i lam nyid la/ /yang dang yang du sems pa dang / /'jal dang

nges rtog sgom pa'i lam/ /de ni rgyun chags yin pa'i phyir/ /chung dang 'bring dang chen po rnams/ /chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yis/ /rnam pas rnam pa dgur bzhed do/ /grangs med la sogs bstan pa rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bzod ma yin/ /

kun rdzob tu ni thugs brtse bas/ /rgyu mthun de dag thub pa bzhed/ /dngos po brjod du med pa la/ /nyams pa dang ni 'phel mi rung / /sgom zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni/ /ci zhig nyams shing ci zhig 'thob/ /byang chub ji lta de bzhin du/ /'di ni 'dod pa'i don sgrub

byed/ /byang chub de bzhin nyid mtshan nyid/ /de yang de yi mtshan nyid bzhed/ /sems ni snga mas byang chub par/ /rigs min phyi mas kyang ni min/ /mar me'i dpe yi tshul gyis ni/ /zab mo'i chos nyid rnam pa brgyad/ /skye ba dang ni 'gag pa dang / /de bzhin

nyid dang shes bya dang / /shes dang spyod dang gnyis med dang / /thabs mkhas pa la zab pa nyid/ /chos rnams rmi lam 'dra ba'i phyir/ /srid dang zhi bar mi rtog pa/ /las med la sogs klan ka yi/ /lan ni ji skad bshad par zad/ /sems can 'jig rten de

bzhin du/ /snod kyi 'jig rten ma dag pa/ /de la dag par sgrub pa yis/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni dag pa nyid/ /yul dang sbyor ba can 'di ni/ /dgra rnams las ni 'das pa dang / /mi shes ji bzhin shugs dang ni/ /thun mong ma yin mtshan nyid dang / /ma chags

pa dang mi dmigs dang / /mtshan ma smon lam zad pa dang / /de yi rtags dang tshad med pa/ /thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa bcu/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/ skabs bzhi pa'o// //

rmi lam na yang chos rnams kun/ /rmi lam lta bur lta la sogs/ /rtse mor phyin par sbyor ba'i rtags/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis dag tu bzhed/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo rnyed/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa'i dge la sogs/ /rnam mang du ni dper mdzad nas/ /rnam 'phel bcu

drug bdag nyid do/ /kun mkhyen nyid gsum chos rnams kyi/ /yongs su rdzogs pa bla med pa/ /sems can don yongs mi gtong ba/ /bstan pa zhes ni mngon par brjod/ /gling bzhi pa dang stong dag dang / /stong gnyis gsum dag dper mdzad nas/ /bsod nams

mang po nyid kyis ni/ /ting 'dzin yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la/ /gzung ba'i rnam rtog so sor de/ /dgu yi bdag nyid ji bzhin yul/ /min pa'i bdag nyid dag shes bya/ /so so'i skye bo 'phags dbye bas/ /sems can rdzas dang btags

yod par/ /rnam rtog 'dzin pa dag tu 'dod/ /de dag so sor dgu bdag nyid/ /gal te gzung don de bzhin med/ /de dag gang gi 'dzin par 'dod/ /de ltar de dag 'dzin pa yi/ /ngo bos stong pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /ngo bo nyid dang rigs dang ni/ /lam ni yang dag 'grub

pa dang / /shes pa'i dmigs pa ma 'khrul dang / /mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dang / /rang gis rtogs dang byed pa dang / /de yi las bya'i 'bras bu la/ /'jug pa'i phyogs kyi rten can gyi/ /rnam rtog de ni rnam dgur 'dod/ /srid dang zhi bar ltung ba'i phyir/ /

rtogs pa dman pa nyid dang ni/ /yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / /lam gyi rnam pa ma tshang dang / /gzhan gyi rkyen gyis 'gro ba dang / /ched du bya ba log pa dang / /nyi tshe ba dang sna tshogs nyid/ /gnas dang 'jug la rmongs pa dang / /rjes la 'gro zhes bya ba la/ /

rnam rtog dgu yi bdag nyid 'di/ /ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can te/ /nyan thos la sogs yid la 'byung / /'dzin pa dang ni 'dor ba dang / /yid la byed dang khams rnams ni/ /gsum po dag dang nye 'brel dang / /gnas dang mngon par zhen pa dang / /chos kyi

dngos po brtags pa dang / /chags pa dang ni gnyen po dang / /ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro nyams la/ /'dzin pa dang por shes par bya/ /ched bzhin nges par mi 'byung dang / /lam la lam min nges 'dzin dang / /'gag dang bcas pa'i skye ba dang / /dngos

po ldan dang mi ldan dang / /gnas dang rigs ni 'dzin pa dang / /don du gnyer dang rgyu med dang / /phyir rgal ba ni dmigs pa la/ /'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gzhan yin no/ /byang chub la gzhan ston pa dang / /de yi rgyu ni yongs gtod dang / /de

thob bar chad med pa'i rgyu/ /bsod nams mang po'i mtshan nyid do/ /dri ma zad dang mi skye ba'i/ /ye shes byang chub ces brjod do/ /zad med skye med phyir de dag /go rims bzhin du shes par bya/ /'gog pa med pa'i rang bzhin la/ /mthong zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni/ /

rnam par rtog rigs ci zhig zad/ /skye med rnam pa ci zhig 'thob/ /gzhan gyis chos rnams kyang yod la/ /shes bya la yang ston pa yi/ /sgrib pa zad par brjod pa gang / /de la kho bos mtshar du brtsis/ /'di las bsal bya ci yang med/ /gzhag par bya ba

cung zad med/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag lta/ /yang dag mthong na rnam par grol/ /sbyin pa la sogs re rer ni/ /de dag phan tshun bsdus pa gang / /skad cig gcig pa'i bzod pa yis/ /bsdus pa de 'dir mthong ba'i lam/ /de nas seng ge rnam bsgyings pa'i/ /

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung lugs mthun dang / /lugs mi mthun la rtog par byed/ /'gog dang bcas pa'i snyoms 'jug dgur/ /rnam pa gnyis su song 'ongs nas/ /'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par shes/ /mnyam gzhag

min pa'i mtshams bzung ste/ /thod rgal du ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /gcig dang gnyis gsum bzhi dang lnga/ /drug dang bdun dang brgyad rgal nas/ /'gog pa'i bar du mi 'drar 'gro/ /mdor bsdus rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /bstang bas yongs su ma

bzung dang / /dus gsum yon tan med pa dang / /legs pa'i lam ni rnam gsum la/ /bzung ba'i rnam rtog 'di gcig ste/ /sbyor ba'i rnam pa'i spyod yul can/ /gnyis pa sems dang sems byung rnams/ /'jug pa'i yul can yin bzhed de/ /sems

mi skye dang byang chub kyi/ /snying po yid la mi byed dang / /theg pa dman pa yid byed dang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid mi byed/ /sgom dang sgom pa med pa dang / /de dag las ni bzlog nyid dang / /ji bzhin don min rnam rtog pa/ /sgom pa'i lam la shes par

bya/ /sems can btags pa'i spyod yul dang / /chos btags pa dang stong min nyid/ /chags dang rab 'byed bdag nyid dang / /dngos por byed dang theg gsum dang / /yon ni dag pa ma yin dang / /spyod pa rnam par 'khrug pa la/ /'dzin par byed pa dang

por te/ /shes par bya ba bsgrags pa yin/ /sems can btags dang de'i rgyu yi/ /yul can de yis rnam 'joms pas/ /sgom pa'i lam dang 'brel pa yi/ /mi mthun phyogs gzhan rnam pa dgu/ /bdag nyid ji bzhin kun mkhyen ni/ /gsum gyi

sgrib pa rnam gsum dang / /zhi lam de bzhin nyid sogs dang / /mtshungs par ldan dang mi ldan dang / /mi mnyam sdug bsngal la sogs dang / /nyon mongs rnams kyi rang bzhin dang / /gnyis su med dang kun rmongs la/ /rnam par rtog pa tha mar bzhed/ /

yams nad 'di rnams zad nas ni/ /yun ring lon nas dbugs phyin ltar/ /rnam pa kun tu 'gro ba yi/ /bde sgrub yon tan phun tshogs kun/ /rgya mtsho che la chu bo bzhin/ /'bras bu mchog gis spa ba yis/ /sems dpa' chen po de la ni/ /rnam

pa kun du rten par byed/ /stong gsum skye bo nyan thos dang / /bse ru'i rtogs pa phun tshogs dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med la/ /bkod pa'i dge ba dper mdzad nas/ /bsod nams mang po nyid kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar med de/ /bar

chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /de ni rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid/ /'di yi dmigs pa dngos med de/ /bdag po dran pa yin par bzhed/ /rnam pa zhi nyid 'di la ni/ /rab tu smra rnams brgyud par rgol/ /dmigs pa 'thad dang de yi ni/ /ngo bo nyid nges bzung ba

dang / /rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes dang / /dam pa'i don dang kun rdzob dang / /sbyor dang dkon mchog gsum po dang / /thabs bcas thub pa'i rtogs pa dang / /phyin ci log ni lam bcas dang / /gnyen po mi mthun phyogs dag dang / /mtshan

nyid dang ni sgom pa la/ /smra ba rnams kyis log rtog pa/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid rten can/ /rnam pa bcu drug dag tu bzhed/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/ skabs lnga pa'o// //

sbyin pa shes rab bar dag dang / /sangs rgyas la sogs dran dang chos/ /dngos med ngo bo nyid kyis de/ /mthar gyis pa yi bya bar bzhed/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/ skabs

drug pa'o// //sbyin pa la sogs re res kyang / /zag med chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir/ /thub pa'i skad cig gcig pa yis/ /rtogs pa 'di ni shes par bya/ /ji ltar skyes bus zo chun rgyud/ /rdog thabs gcig gis bskyod pa na/ /thams

cad cig car 'gul ba ltar/ /skad cig gcig shes de bzhin no/ /gang tshe chos dkar thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin/ /rnam smin chos nyid gnas skabs skyes/ /de tshe skad cig gcig ye shes/ /sbyin la sogs pa'i spyod pa yis/ /

chos kun rmi lam 'drar gnas nas/ /chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa nyid/ /skad cig ma ni gcig gis rtogs/ /rmi lam dang ni de mthong nyid/ /gnyis kyi tshul du mi mthong ltar/ /chos rnams gnyis su med pa yi/ /de nyid skad cig gcig gis mthong / /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/ skabs bdun pa'o// //thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni/ /zag pa med pa'i chos gang dag /thob gyur rnam kun rnam dag pa/ /de dag

rang bzhin mtshan nyid can/ /byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang / /rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni/ /snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang / /zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang / /zil gyis gnon pa'i skya mched ni/ /rab tu dbye bas rnam brgyad dang / /

nyon mongs med dang smon mkhyen dang / /mngon shes so so yang dag rig /rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang / /dbang bcu dang ni stobs bcu dang / /mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dang / /bsrung ba med pa rnam gsum dang / /dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum

dang / /bsnyel ba mi mnga'i chos nyid dang / /bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang / /skye la thugs rje chen po dang / /thub pa kho na'i ma 'dres chos/ /bco brgyad bshad pa gang yin dang / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang / /chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin/ /

nyan thos nyon mongs med pa'i lta/ /nyan thos nyon mongs yongs spong nyid/ /grong sogs su de'i nyon mongs rnams/ /rgyun gcod rgyal ba'i nyon mongs med/ /sangs rgyas smon nas mkhyen pa ni/ /lhun gyis grub dang chags spangs dang / /thogs pa med

dang rtag gnas dang / /dri ba kun lan 'debs par bzhed/ /rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur nas/ /gang dang gang la gang dang ni/ /gang tshe bya ba phan gyur pa/ /de dang de la de snang ngo / /lha yi rgyal pos char phab kyang / /sa bon mi rung mi

'khrungs ltar/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur kyang / /skal ba med pas bzang mi myong / /de ltar mdzad pa rgya che'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod/ /de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir/ /rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin/ /

mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / /dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di/ /theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir/ /thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed/ /phyag zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs/ /phyag dang zhabs sor dra

bas 'brel pa dang / /phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags/ /'di yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang / /sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang / /zhabs 'bur mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs/ /byin pa e na

ya'i 'dra phyag ring mdzes/ /mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog /pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang / /spu ni re re nas g.yas legs 'khrungs dang / /zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge 'dra/ /'di yi dpung pa'i mgo zlum thal

gong rgyas/ /'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang / /sku ni n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab/ /gtsug tor dbur ldan ljags ring mdzes pa dang / /tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems/ /shin tu dkar dang tshed mnyam thags bzang dang / /grangs

ni bzhi bcu tham par tshang ba dang / /spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi /'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /'di la mtshan ni gang gang gis/ /sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin/ /de dang de ni rab rdzogs pas/ /mtshan ni 'di dag yang dag

'grub/ /bla ma skyel la sogs pa dang / /yang dag blangs pa brtan pa dang / /bsdu ba bsten dang gya nom pa'i/ /dngos po sbyin dang gsad bya ba/ /thar bar byed dang dge ba ni/ /yang dag blangs pa spel la sogs/ /sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid

de/ /mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin/ /thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang / /mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams/ /zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang / /rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa med/ /long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang / /seng ge

glang chen bya dang ni/ /khyu mchog stabs gshegs g.yas phyogs dang / /mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags/ /byi dor byas 'dra rim par 'tsham/ /gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku/ /mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /

sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang / /gom snyoms pa dang spyan gnyis ni/ /dag dang gzhon sha can nyid dang / /sku zhum med dang rgyas pa dang / /shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang / /yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang / /gzigs pa sgrib med dag pa dang / /

dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang / /phyang nge ba dang lte ba ni/ /zab dang g.yas phyogs 'khyil ba dang / /kun nas blta na sdug pa dang / /kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni/ /sme ba gnag bag med pa dang / /phyag ni shing bal ltar 'jam dang / /

phyag ris mdangs yod zab ring dang / /zhal ni ha cang mi ring dang / /mchu ni bim+pa ltar dmar dang / /ljags mnyen pa dang srab pa dang / /dmar dang 'brug gi sgra nyid dang / /gsung mnyen 'jam dang mche ba zlum/ /rno dang dkar dang mnyam

pa dang / /byin gyis phra dang shangs mtho dang / /mchog tu dag pa dag dang ni/ /spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug /pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang / /smin tshugs ring dang 'jam pa dang / /snum dang spu ni mnyam pa dang / /phyag ring rgyas

dang snyan mnyam dang / /nyams pa rnam par spangs pa dang / /dpral ba legs par 'byes pa dang / /dbyes che ba dang dbu rgyas dang / /dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag dang / /stug dang 'jam dang ma 'dzings dang / /mi bshor dri zhim skyes bu

yi/ /yid ni 'phrog par byed pa dang / /dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis ni/ /g.yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa ste/ /sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed/ /gang gi srid pa ji srid par/ /'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag /mnyam du mdzad

pa'i sku de ni/ /thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad/ /de bzhin 'khor ba ji srid 'di'i/ /las ni rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod/ /'gro rnams zhi ba'i las dang ni/ /bsdu rnam bzhi la 'god pa dang / /kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yi/ /rnam par byang ba

rtogs pa dang / /sems can rnams don ji bzhin gyi/ /don dang pha rol phyin drug dang / /sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyis/ /stong pa nyid dang gnyis zad dang / /brda dang dmigs pa med pa dang / /lus can rnams ni yongs smin

dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ni/ /mngon par zhen pa zlog pa dang / /byang chub thob dang sangs rgyas zhing / /rnam par dag dang nges pa dang / /sems can don ni tshad med dang / /sangs rgyas rten sogs yon tan dang / /byang chub yan lag las

rnams ni/ /chud mi za dang bden mthong dang / /phyin ci log ni spangs pa dang / /de gzhi med pa'i tshul dang ni/ /rnam par byang dang tshogs dang ni/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas pa la/ /tha dad yongs su mi shes dang / /mya ngan 'das la 'god pa

ste/ /chos kyi sku yi phrin las ni/ /rnam pa nyi shu bdun du bzhed/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'ur byas pa las/ skabs brgyad pa'o// //mtshan nyid de yi sbyor ba dang / /

de rab de yi go rims dang / /de mtha' de yi rnam smin ni/ /don bsdus gzhan de rnam pa drug /yul ni rnam pa gsum po rgyu/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi bdag nyid dang / /chos sku phrin las 'bras bu ni/ /don bsdus gzhan te rnam pa gsum/ /
'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta go mi 'chi med dang / lo tsA ba
blo ldan shes rab kyi 'gyur// //
@#/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i tshul gyi mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa bzhugs/

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa biM sha ti sA ha sri ka Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA u pa de shA a b+hi sa ma ya a laM kA ra shAs+t+ra s+ya br-it+ti/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi

'grel pa/ bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin

dang / /'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang / /gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsungs pa / /nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum de la phyag

'tshal/ /don gang zhig yin zhe na/ 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dbang du mdzad nas thams cad mkhyen pa rnam pa gsum gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan nye bar dgod pa sngon du 'gro bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes brjod pa 'di ni

de'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi man ngag bshad sbyar du bya'o snyam pas rnam par dgrol bar bya'o/ /zhes mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi bshad pa 'di sbyar bar dam bca' ba yin no/ /ci'i don du zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam/ /ston pas 'di rnams bshad pa

gang / /gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin de / /chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi/ /mdo don dran pa la gzhag nas/ /blo dang ldan pas mthong gyur phyir/ /bde blag tu ni rtogs pa zhes/ /bya ba brtsam pa'i dgos pa yin/ /zhes de ltar phyag 'tshal ba nye bar bkod pa'i

tshigs su bcad pas yang dag par mtshon pa'i don 'di yod pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /ci mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan 'di gzhi bsdus pas sam/ 'on te gnyen po bsdus pas sam/ de ste rnam pa bsdus pas rgyan du byed pa yin zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya

ba yin no/ /de las kyang cir 'gyur zhe na/ phyogs dang po ltar na ni 'bad pa don med pa yin te/ mdo sde 'di las mtshan nyid kyi bstan bcos dag las mi smos pa'i gzhi gang yin pa de bshad pa ni med do/ /gnyis pa ltar na rnam par byang

ba'i dngos po bsdus pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dngos po ma bsdus pas 'di gang gi gnyen po yin pa rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsum pa ltar na yang rnam pa gzhi med pa tsam zhig bsdus pa'i phyir/ don rtogs pa med pas cung zad kyang ma bshad pa yin no zhe na/

phyogs gsum car gyis kyang bsdus pa yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam shes pa nyid

dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis mngon par rtogs pa mtha' dag bsdus pa'i phyir ro/ /ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no/ /lam shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thams cad 'tshal ba nyid nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags/ rab 'byor

thams cad ni phyi dang nang gi chos rnams ji snyed pa 'di tsam yin la de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes kyi/ lam thams cad kyis kyang ma yin la/ rnam pa thams cad du'ang ma yin pas de'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni thams cad shes pa

nyid ces bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa 'tshal ba nyid byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lags/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni nyan thos kyi lam gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi lam

gang yin pa'i lam thams cad bskyed par bya zhing lam thams cad shes par bya la de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing de dag gis lam gyi bya ba yang bya ste/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas pa dang /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma sbyangs par de dag gis yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags/ rab 'byor rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnam par rab tu mtshon pa'i rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag de bzhin

gshegs pas thugs su chud de de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de la thams cad shes pa nyid ni chos la 'bad pa'i rten can/ 'bras

bu bdag tu rmongs pa spangs pa can yin no/ /lam shes pa nyid ni theg pa ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'byung ba dang / de kho na nyid mngon du mi byed pa'i rten can/ sems can ma bsdus pa sdud pa dang / sems can yongs su ma smin pa yongs su smin par byed pa

dang / sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par grol bar byed pa'i 'bras bu can yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs par sems can gyi don rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs pa dang / bag chags kyis

mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa'i 'bras bu can yin no/ /de lta bas na mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ni gzhi dang gnyen po dang rnam pa rnams bsdus pas mngon par rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa mtha' dag bstan pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba 'di 'thad pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa de gang yin zhes bya ba 'di ni brjod par bya'o zhe na/ bshad pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni/ /dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad/ /rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid/ /de nas thams cad shes pa nyid/ /rnam kun

mngon rdzogs rtogs pa dang / /rtse mor phyin dang mthar gyis pa/ /skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub/ /chos kyi sku dang de rnams brgyad/ /sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang / /nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang / /sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa/ /

chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / /dmigs pa dag dang ched dang ni/ /go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang / /tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams/ /thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid/ /mog mog por byed la sogs dang / /slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang / /

'di dang gzhan pa'i yon tan gyis/ /phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam/ /byed pa dang ni mos pa dang / /bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang / /bsngo dang rjes su yi rang ba/ /yid la byed pa bla med dag /sgrub dang shin tu dag pa zhes/ /bya ba 'di ni bsgom

pa'i lam/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyis / /lam shes nyid ni de 'drar bshad/ /shes pas srid la mi gnas shing / /snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang / /thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang / /thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid/ /mi mthun gnyen po'i

phyogs dag dang / /sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang / /nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i lam/ /de 'dra kun shes nyid du 'dod/ /rnam pa sbyor bar bcas rnams dang / /yon tan skyon ni mtshan nyid bcas/ /thar dang nges 'byed cha mthun dang / /slob pa phyir mi ldog

pa'i tshogs/ /srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid dang / /zhing dag bla na med pa ni/ /rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa ste/ /'di ni thabs mkhas bcas pa yin/ /de yi rtags dang rnam 'phel dang / /brtan dang sems kun gnas pa dang / /mthong zhes bya dang sgom

pa zhes/ /bya ba'i lam ni so so la/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi/ /gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni/ /bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /log par sgrub dang bcas pa ni/ /rtse mo'i mngon rtogs mthar gyis pa/ /rnam gsum rnam bcu skad cig ma/ /gcig

gis mngon rdzogs byang chub pa/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi/ /ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang / /de bzhin gzhan pa sprul pa ni/ /chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa/ /rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod/ /ces bya ba yin no/ /tshig le'ur

byas pa bco lngas mdor bsdus pa dang rgyas par bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bsdus par rig par bya'o/ /ji ltar zhe na/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni/ /dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad/ /ces bya ba nas/ chos kyi sku dang de rnams brgyad/ /ces bya ba'i bar

gyi tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis po 'di dag gis ni mdor bsdus pa yin no/ /de la dngos po brgyad ni 'di yin no/ /'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam shes pa nyid dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs

par rtogs pa dang / rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa dang / mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis mngon par rtogs pa dang / chos kyi sku'o/ /sems bskyed pa dang / gdams ngag dang / nges 'byed yan lag rnam

bzhi dang / /zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/ chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa/ /rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod/ /ces bya ba'i bar gyi tshig le'ur byas pa bcu gsum gyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa don brgyad po de rnams kyi dngos po bsdus te bstan

pas rgyas par bshad pa yin te/ de ltar na mdor bsdus pa dang rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir legs par bshad pa yin no/ /don gyi lus rnam par bzhag pa brjod zin to/ /'di phan chad ni don gang la khyad par can gyi rnam pa gang gi rab tu dbye ba'i chos gang dag bstan pa de

dag gi go rims bsdu ba 'ba' zhig brjod par bya'o/ /de la re zhig /sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/ /'on te 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin zhe na/ 'di 'dod pa dang de 'dod pas/ /byang chub

sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o zhes mdo nas bshad pa gang dag yin pa 'di yin no/ /'di mtshan nyid ci yin zhes bya ba de nyid mi shes te don de gang yin zhe na/ 'di ni stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa 'di nyid las don du gnyer ba yin no zhes

gsungs te 'di ltar sems bskyed pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub par bya'o zhes de ltar don du gnyer bar byed pa yin no/ /'o na ni de sems

bskyed par mi 'gyur te/ sems ni yul so sor rig pa'i mtshan nyid can yin la/ don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba ni sred pa yin pas so zhe na de ni de ltar bden mod kyi 'on kyang dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'i mtshan nyid don du gnyer ba yod na sangs rgyas nyid kyi don du

sems skyed par byed pas na 'dir rgyu 'bras bus bstan pa yin te/ de ltar na 'dun cing don du gnyer ba'i dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad ces bya ba rjes su mthun par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba ni smon lam yin no/ /sems bskyed

pa'i gnas skabs ni don du gnyer ba gtsor gyur pa yin pas na de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i sems bskyed pa la don du gnyer ba bstan pa yin te/ de lta na yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'thad par 'gyur

ba yin no/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang gzhan gyi don de yang gang yin zhe na/ de dang de ni mdo bzhin du/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa'i sgo nas brjod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ de dang zhes bya ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang de ni zhes bya ba gzhan gyi don to/ /

de la de'i bsdus te bstan pa 'di yin te/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa yin no/ /de la de'i rgyas par

bstan pa ni 'di yin te/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa dang / sbyin par bya ba dang / len pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir yongs su btang ba med pa'i tshul

gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin no/ /de la gzhan gyi don gyis bsdus te bstan pa ni 'di yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyogs bcu re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang zhig yod pa de dag thams cad phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de la de'i rgyas

par bstan pa ni 'di yin te/ sems can ser sna can rnams ni sbyin pa la/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams ni tshul khrims la rab tu dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang

gsungs pa'o / /de ltar sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang ched du bya ba dang bcas pa brjod nas/ da ni de'i rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi dbang du mdzad pa ni/ de yang sa gser zla ba me/ /gter dang rin

chen 'byung gnas mtsho/ /rdo rje ri sman bshes gnyen dang / /yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma glu/ /rgyal po mdzod dang lam po che/ /bzhon pa bkod ma'i chu dang ni/ /sgra bsnyan chu bo sprin rnams kyis/ /rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/ /zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no/ /

de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa dang po 'dun pa dang ldan pa ni sa lta bu'o/ /shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin te/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang de'i tshogs bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /gnyis pa

bsam pa dang ldan pa ni gser bzang po lta bu'o/ /shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas pa med pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa dang gtong ba dang yongs su len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yongs

su btang ba med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin du chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa ste/ pha rol tu phyin

pa drug gis bsdu ba'i phan pa dang bde ba'i bsam pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du gnas pas na bsam pa yin pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa dang 'di la rnam par 'gyur ba mi bsten pa'i phyir ro/ /gsum pa lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa ni yar ngo'i zla ba tshes

pa lta bu'o/ /des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba nas/ mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dgu bsgom par bya ba'i bar dang / skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad bsgom par bya ba'i bar dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur bar bsam pa lhag pa yin pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya bas so/ /bzhi pa sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni me lta bu'o/

thams cad shes pa nyid la shes pa dang mthong bas bltas nas 'da' bar 'dod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / lam shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi sbyor ba ni mchog tu gyur pa'i sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba yin pas na bud shing gi khyad par gyis me bzhin du gong nas gong du khyad par du

'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /lnga pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni gter chen po lta bu'o/ /sems can ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la 'jog par 'dod pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa rnams sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par

'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos zhes gang gsungs pa ste/ zang zing gi longs spyod kyis sems can tshad med pa tshim par byed kyang yongs su gtugs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /drug pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas lta

bu'o/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshul khrims la 'jog par 'dod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims rnams rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste/ yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa thams cad ni de las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /bdun pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o/ /gnod sems dang ldan pa rnams

bzod pa la 'jog par 'dod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs

pa ste/ mi 'dod pa thog tu babs pa thams cad kyis 'khrug par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /brgyad pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rdo rje lta bu'o/ /le lo can dag brtson 'grus la 'jog par 'dod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang

sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste/ de ni yid brtan pas mi [(]phyad [,]phyed [)]pa'i phyir ro/ /

dgu pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni ri'i rgyal po lta bu'o/ /sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams bsam gtan la 'jog par 'dod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig

gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste/ de ni dmigs pa'i rnam par g.yeng bas mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro/ /bcu pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni sman

lta bu'o/ /sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams shes rab la rab tu 'jog par 'dod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab rnams rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ste/ de ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcu gcig pa thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bu'o/ /

dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pas mi zad par byed par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal bzod par 'dod pa dang / bskal

pa brgya stong du yang dag par bsags pa'i tshul khrims kyang sems can la ltos nas 'dor bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos zhes gang gsungs pa ste/ de ni gnas skabs thams cad du sems can gyi

don yongs su mi gtong ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'dir kha cig na re bden pa dang gtong ba dang shes rab nye bar zhi ba la brten pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes zer ro/ /gzhan dag ni mthong ba'i lam gyis bsdus pa sa la 'jug pa'i sems yin te/ 'di

ltar mdo las gang gi tshe sems bskyed pa dang lhan cig skyes pa na byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin no zhes gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro/ /gzhan dag ni da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du phyogs par

gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang snying rje chen po gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes 'dod do/ /la la dag ni sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab pa la bya bar 'dod do/ /kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bya'o zhes zer ro/ /gzhan ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams

kyi yum ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no / /yab ni thabs mkhas pa yin pas/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes 'dod do/ /bcu gnyis pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su

sgrub par 'dod pa dang / phyogs bcu re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par chos ston pas go bar byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs pa ste/ de ni ji ltar smon pa'i 'bras bu

'grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcu gsum pa stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni nyi ma lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa yin te /

de ni gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /bcu bzhi pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa sgra dbyangs snyan pa lta bu'o/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi tshad shes par 'dod pa

dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa 'di ltar byin pa ni 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa 'di ltar byin pas ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu la sogs par skye ba nas/ de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa 'di ltar byin na ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa ste/ de ni gdul bya 'dun par byed pa'i ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de la sA la chen po zhes bya ba ni mngon par mtshon par bya ba'i dbang phyug dang

ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /bco lnga pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa ni rgyal po lta bu'o/ /sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu re rer 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'dod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

khams kyi chu'i phung po chen po de thams cad lan brgyar skra'i rtse mos thams cad gtor bar 'dod cing yang de na gnas pa'i srog chags rnams la mi gnod par 'dod pa dang / bskal pa sreg pa'i me la kha'i dbugs gcig gis zhi bar bya bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par

'thor ba chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor sor mo gcig gi rtse mos yongs su khebs par bya bar 'dod pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa de thams cad skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par yang dag par 'dod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sogs pa'i ri rnams skra nyag

ma gcig gis sbams te gyen du bteg nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med par 'phang bar 'dod pa dang / phyogs bcu re re'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha'i mig gis lta bar 'dod pa dang / de rnams las kyang chos bstan pa

lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par 'dod pa dang / de rnams kyi 'ang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa sgrub par 'dod cing yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon

du mi byed par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gsungs pa ste/ de ni mthu thogs pa med par gzhan gyi don sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sogs pa skra nyag ma gcig gis bcings te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par 'phen pa la ni ma

dad par mi bya ste/ bsam gtan pa rnams kyi dbang 'byor pa ston pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcu drug pa bsod nams dang ye shes dang ldan pa ni bang mdzod lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas tshad med pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji

snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bsod snyoms gcig gis khyed par bya bar 'dod pa dang / bden pa mthong ba rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la 'jog par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

chen pos zhes gang gsungs pa yin te/ de ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mang po'i bang mdzod lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bcu bdun pa byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni lam po che lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /

ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad rjes su 'thob par 'dod pa dang / chos 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs pa ste/ de ni 'phags pa'i gang zag

thams cad gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bco brgyad pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang ldan pa ni bzhon pa lta bu'o/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad

kyi nang gi 'khor du 'gyur 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'thob par 'dod pa dang / yon tan rnam par sbyar bar 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bya ba dang / bkur

sti dang rdzas las byung ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la sems can rnams dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs pa yin te/ de ni zung du 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang du 'ang mi ltung bas bde blag

tu khyer bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de la nang gi 'khor zhes bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang bar 'jug pa'i ye shes phra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes la rjes su zhugs par gyur pa'o/ /bcu dgu pa gzungs dang spobs pa dang ldan pa ni bkod ma'i chu lta

bu'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang gsung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang lung bstan pa nas/ shin tu rgyas pa dang rmad du byung ba'i bar gang cung zad bstan pa de thams cad thos par

'dod pa dang / gzung bar 'dod pa dang / yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'dod pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ste/ de ni chu 'dzin pa dang mi zad par 'byin pa dang

chos mthun par thos pa dang ma thos pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / bstan pa mthar thug pa med pa 'byin pa'i phyir ro / /nyi shu pa chos kyi dga' ston dang ldan pa ni sgra snyan pa lta bu'o/ /phyogs bcu re re zhing 'jig rten gyi bar yun ring por mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa

lus kyi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas der skyes pa'i sems can la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang / de dag yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs pa yin te/

des ni thar pa 'dod pa'i gdul bya rnams la snyan pa sgrogs pa yin pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dga' ston yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par so sor rtog pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pa dang /

chos thams cad bdag med par so sor rtog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi bar so sor rtog pa'o/ /nyi shu gcig pa bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam dang ldan pa ni chu bo'i rgyun lta bu'o/ /phyogs bcu re re mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi

sems can long ba dang / 'on pa dang / smyon pa dang / gcer bu dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa la sogs pa dang / ngan song du ltung ba rnams sdug bsngal de dang de las thar bar byas te mi'i lus 'thob par 'dod pa dang / de rnams kyang tshul

khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs pa yin te/ de ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas rang

gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i phyir dang / bgrod pa gcig pa nyid ni sa der gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzhan gyi don gyi bya ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro/ /nyi shu gnyis pa chos kyi sku dang ldan pa ni sprin lta bu'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam bstan

par 'dod pa dang / glang po che'i lta stangs kyis lta bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes rgya cher yang gsungs pa ste/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa kun du ston pas sems can gyi don bya ba rnam pa thams cad de la rag las pa'i phyir ro/ /sems

bskyed pa gsum par mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dgu bsgom par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa de ni rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par gnag pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam

par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes so/ /de la 'tsho ba mthar thug pa'i 'og tu go rims bzhin du sbud

pa rlung gis khengs pa ltar mtho bar skrangs shing rbobs par gyur pa'i phyir rnam par bam pa'o/ /rnam par bam pa nyid ni rnam par bam pa pa'o / /yang na mi mthun pa'i phyir btsog cing rnam par bam pas na A byA b+h+yA ta ka zhes bye brag rtog byed du byung d+h+ma ta kA te rnam par

bam pa pa'o/ /'di ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin can ro'i lus kyi tshig bla dgas yin no/ /de bzhin du gzhan du yang bshad pa ni ming la stsogs pa'i don dag la brjod par bya ba yin no/ /de ni dbyibs la chags pa rnams la lus de'i dbyibs kyi rgyud pa ston pa'i phyir

'di bsgom par bya ba yin no/ /'bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis nang du bskyod pas na bi d+hu bi pa tu ma ka ta kA zhes bya ba rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa pa ste/ de ni lus kyi mkhregs pa'i dngos po la chags pa la khong stong gi dngos po nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /gnas

tha dad pa nas rnag 'dzag pa ni rnam par gnag pa ste/ de ni phreng ba dang dri la sogs pa'i dbang las byung ba'i lus kyi dri la chags pa rnams la lus kyi rma dang 'brel pa'i dri nga ba nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /'di dang de nas khrag 'gyed cing rnam par 'phro la rab tu 'dzag

pas na rnam par dmar ba pa ste/ de ni rgyan gyis byas pa'i mdzes pa la chags pa la khrag gis sbags pa'i mi mthun pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir yin no/ /rnam par gsal bar sngo bas na rnam par bsngos pa pa ste/ de ni lus kyi kha dog la chags pa la pags pa'i 'dod

chags kyi rgud pa bstan pa'i phyir yin no/ /khyi dang ce spyang la sogs pas phan tshun du rnam pa sna tshogs par zos pa ni rnam par zos pa pa ste/ de ni nu ma la sogs pa'i sha rgyas pa la chags pa la sha rgyas pa rnam par 'jig par bstan pa'i phyir yin no/ /lag pa gnyis

kyang gzhan du/ rkang pa gnyis kyang gzhan du/ mgo bo yang gzhan du/ sna tshogs par 'thor bas na rnam par 'thor ba pa ste/ de ni yan lag dang nying lag gi sgeg pa la chags pa la yan lag dang nying lag rnam par 'thor bar bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /rus pa

nyid ni rus pa pa ste/ 'di ni rus pa sbrel ma dang rus pa gcig gi'ang tshig bla dgas te / de ni so la sogs pa'i rus pa'i 'byor pa la chags pa la lus kyi rus pa'i mi mthun pa'i dngos po ston pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par zhu zhing tshig pas rnam par tshig pa pa ste/ de ni

kha dog dang dbyibs la chags pa la pags pa dang dbyibs kun du 'khums pa ston pa yin pa'i phyir 'di bsgom par bya ba yin no/ /skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos 'di ni 'dod pa chung ba rnams kyi yin gyi/ 'dod pa che

ba rnams ma yin pa dang / chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi yin gyi/ shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyi ni ma yin pa ste/ skyes bu

chen po'i rnam par rtog pa bdun po 'di dag gis gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po gnas par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyis skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad po 'di dag la yang rnam par rtogs shig /chos 'di ni

spros pa med pa spros pa med pa la kun dga' ba/ spros pa med pa la kun dga' ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson pa yin no zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'dod pa chung bas chos bzhi spong ste/ 'di ltar tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhogs slong dang / thob

kyis 'jal ba'o/ /de la tshul 'chos zhes bya ba 'di na kha cig rnyed pa don du gnyer zhing rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa sems ltos pa dang bcas pa dang 'brel pas dgon pa pa'am/ phyag dar khrod pa'am/ stan gcig pa nas sbyangs pa'i yon tan

gzhan gang yang rung ba la nye bar bsten te gnas par gyur pa na/ de 'di snyam du bdag la gzhan dag gis bsnyen bkur byed/ bla mar byed/ mchod par byed/ rjed par byed na ci ma rung bdag gis kyang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs

su bcad pa grub par bya na ci ma rung snyam du sems shing / de rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du gnyer zhing rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod pa de tshul de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi spyod lam byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni tshul 'chos pa zhes bya'o/ /kha gsag ces bya ba ni 'di na kha cig

rnyed pa dang bkur sti la ltos pa dang bcas pas gzhan dag la 'di skad du khyod ni bdag gi ma ji lta ba de 'dra ba dang / pha ji lta ba dang / spun zla ji lta ba dang / nye du gang yang rung ba dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams ji lta ba de 'dra ba yin te/ nga la yang sbyin par bya ste

nged kyis kyang khyed la sbyin no/ /nga'i bya ba bgyis te nged kyis kyang khyed kyi bya'o/ /kho bo ni thag ring po nas kyang khyed kyi thad du 'ong zhing kho bo 'dir gnas pa gang yin pa'ang khyed cag nyid kyi don du yin no zhes smra ste/ de rnams la gces par 'gyur ro/ /rnyed pa don du

gnyer zhing rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod pa ltos pa dang bcas pa sems 'brel pa de gzhan dag la tshul de lta bur kha gsag kun du smra ba dang / yongs su smra ba dang / don du gnyer ba dang / kha zhu 'brel par bcas pa dang / gcam gsag gi las byed pa gang yin

pa 'di ni kha gsag ces bya'o/ /gzhogs slong zhes bya ba ni 'di na kha cig so sor brtags shing rnyed pa la brten nas dngos po dang de'i rgyu mtshan du las byed pa ste/ khyod kyi lhung bzed 'di ni mdzes so zhe'am/ chos gos sam/ snam sbyar ram/ mal stan nam/

lde mig kyog po'am/ khyod kyi yo byad 'di dang 'di ni bzang ngo / /gal te kho bos 'di lta bu zhig rnyed na bcang ba bya ba na/ sbyin pa po 'ang rnyed pa dka'o zhes bya ba dang / gang yang rung ba'i khyim du 'ang song nas der 'di skad ces kyang smra ste/ khyed kyi 'bras chan 'di

ni bzang po yin no/ /sran tshod bzang ngo / /bla gos bzang ngo / /gos bzang ngo / /khyed kyi bca' bar bya ba'am/ bza' bar bya ba 'di ni bzang po yin no/ /sngon chad kyang bdag cag la khyed kyis sbyin par bya ba dang bsgrub par bya bar gyur pa yin la/

kho bo cag khyed kyis byin pa dang bsgrubs pas dga' bar gyur pa yin na/ da ltar ni khyed cag bdag cag la sbyin par bya ba'am/ bsgrub par bya bar mi sems so zhes smra ba lta bu ste/ de'i so sor brtags nas brkam pa las byung ba'i gzhogs slong gi las dngos

po de dang de nyid kyi rgyu mtshan du brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni gzhogs slong zhes bya'o/ /nges par ston pa zhes bya ba ni 'di na kha cig rnyed pa don du gnyer ba rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod pa ltos pa dang bcas pa sems 'brel pas gzhan dag la 'di skad ces khyed kyis ma la yang

sbyin par mi bya/ pha la yang ma yin/ sring mo la yang ma yin/ nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi bya bar khyed kyis gang zhig la sbyin par bya ba 'am bya ba bsgrub pa yin zhes smra zhing / khyim 'ga' zhig tu song nas der

yang 'di skad ces khyed kyi khyim du dgra bcom pa zhugs shing khyed dang dgra bcom pa lhan cig tu phrad pa dang / lhan cig tu 'dug pa dang / gtam smra bar 'gyur ba ni khyed rnyed pa dang ldan pa'o/ /khyed kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /khyed kyis 'byor pa

legs par thob bo/ /mir rnyed pa'ang don yod pa yin no zhes smra zhing / de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gi khyim du 'phags pa 'di las ma gtogs par dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan ni su 'ang ma zhugs pas nges par 'phags pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba yin no

zhes bya bar sems na ci ma rung zhes sems pa ste/ rnyed pa don du gnyer ba rnyed pa 'dod pa ltos pa dang bcas pa sems 'brel pa de'i de lta bu'i tshul du gzhan rnams la nges par sgrogs pa gang yin pa 'di ni nges par ston pa zhes bya'o/ /chog shes pa ni rnyed pas rnyed

pa 'dod pa spong bar byed pa yin no/ /de la rnyed pas rnyed pa tshol ba zhes bya ba ni 'di na kha cig rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po'am/ bram ze'am/ khyim bdag gam/ mchog tu gyur pa gzhan gang yang rung bar gyur pas lhung bzed dam/ chos

gos sam/ snam sbyar ram/ lde mig kyog po'am/ stan nam/ yo byad gzhan yang rung ba byin pa yongs su blangs so zhes gzhan dag la ston pa dang / 'di ni bdag la rgyal po che ge mo zhes bya ba'am dam par gyur pa gzhan zhig gis byin no zhes smra zhing de 'di

snyam du 'di rnams 'di ltar de dag kyang re zhig de 'dra bar 'phags pa la sbyin par bya ba'am/ bya ba bsgrub par bya bar sems na/ kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa la sbyin par bya ba'am bya ba bsgrub par ci'i phyir mi sems zhes sems na ci ma rung snyam du sems pas/ de'i

rnyed pa gzhan gyi rnyed pa gzhan 'dod cing tshol ba gang yin pa 'di ni rnyed pas rnyed pa tshol ba zhes bya'o/ /sems bskyed pa'i skabs su mi gtsang ba la sogs pa ci zhig 'brel zhe na/ sems bskyed pa yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can nyid shes par bya ba'i don du

yin no/ /de yongs su nyams pa'i rkyen ni rnam pa dgu ste/ 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags dang / 'dod pa che ba dang / chog mi shes pa dang / 'du 'dzi la mngon par dga' ba dang / le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / shes rab 'chal

ba dang / spros pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams te/ de'i gnyen po'i don du mi gtsang ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin no/ /de bzhin du dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i 'du shes la sogs pa gzhan dag la ci rigs par brjod par bya'o/ /sems bskyed pa

bzhi par thams cad shes pa nyid la mthong bas bltas nas 'da' bar 'dod pa dang / lam shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes gang gsungs pa

de la ye shes mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa'o/ /sa dang po la mthong ba'i lam gyis bsdus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'dod pas zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa'o/ /lam shes pa'i sa phyir mi ldog

pa'i sa la gnas pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pas zhes gang gsungs pa yin no/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa yin te/ 'di ltar de nyid las ye shes phyir mi ldog pa'i sa zhes brjod do zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /

de nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba yin no zhes gsungs pa ni gzhon nu'i sa las 'das par 'dod pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /gzhon nu'i sa yang de nyid yin te/ 'di ltar de nyid las kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i sa zhes brjod do zhes gsungs so/ /

de las 'da' ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag par bskul ba de'i bya ba lhag ma mngon par 'du bya ba'i phyir ro/ /'da' ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/ mthong nas 'da' ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ste de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsgom pa'i lam med pa'i

phyir ro/ /gnas nas 'da' ba ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ste/ bsgom pa'i lam rgyun chags pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na rin chen zla bas zhus pa'i mdo'i rjes su 'brangs nas gsungs pa 'di dang / rin chen phreng ba las bcom ldan 'das dpal bzangs dpal

bzangs zhes bya ba dang / tsan+dan dpal tsan+dan dpal zhes bya ba dang / gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas par snang ba zhes grags shing mtha' yas par snang ba zhes bya ba dang / tog gi dbal tog gi dbal zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan

med pa'i dpal thams cad kyi tshe mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / rin po ches mchod pa dang / rin po che'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / rin chen mchod sdong dang bcas pa dang / rin po che'i mchod sdong zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal zhes

bya ba dang / gsung rnam par gnon pa zhes grags shing gsung rnam par gnon pa zhes grags pa dang / rgyal ba skar ma'i dpal skar ma'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / yon tan rgya che ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / bcom ldan 'das yon tan

dpal zhes bya ba phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi mtshan gzung ba byas na phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du sems can ji snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos pa de

thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de ji lta bu yin zhe na/ 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba nyid phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i rgyu'i dngos po yin par ldog pa las mthong ngo / /bstan pa sgra ji bzhin pa 'di ni dgongs

pa can yin te/ ji skad du mtshan thos pa las rigs kyi bu dag la phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyes par gyur pa yin pas/ sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs nas phyir mi ldog par yang bstan pa yin gyi/ de rnams mtshan thos pa'i mod la phyir mi

ldog par gyur pa ni ma yin no/ /zhes 'dir sa bon rjes thogs nyid la skyes pa dper brjod do/ /de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa nyid phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i rgyu nyid yin par 'thad pa yin no/ /sems bskyed pa bcu gcig par dge ba'i

sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi zad par bya bar 'dod pas zhes gang gsungs pa ni byang chub chen por yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu yang rgya mtsho chen por chu'i thigs pa gcig bor ba'i dpes yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du zad pa med par 'gyur

ba'i phyir ro/ /sems bskyed pa bcu bzhi par chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su rtogs par 'dod pas zhes gang gsungs pa de la/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po'i phyogs la sogs pas bsdus pa'i chos
